{"games":[{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":637737,"totalDownVotes":48343,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":82660,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1193892,"totalDownVotes":128599,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":266236,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay. We are a small two person Dev team working hard to make Brookhaven the best it can be.
Thanks for playing!"},{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4276119,"totalDownVotes":783700,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":118995,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/4939446/RELL-GAMES#!/about"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":541124,"totalDownVotes":37904,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":35134,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu "},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3814953,"totalDownVotes":314773,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":53460,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2811801,"totalDownVotes":367473,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":28833,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons!

Arrivederci!"},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":530887,"totalDownVotes":42921,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"🌌Tower Defense Simulator❄️","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":23367,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌌 WEEK 4 METAVERSE EVENT! 🌌

Check the in-game update log in new servers (the book with the !) for full details!

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡

icon by @ixchoco_!"},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1441065,"totalDownVotes":120431,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":29904,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

--- +4 Barrels Of TNT!
--- 300% more health!
--- 25% more gold!"},{"creatorId":7284047,"creatorName":"Wrongful Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":26507,"totalDownVotes":6182,"universeId":2411591707,"name":"[5X STATS] A Hero's Destiny","placeId":6461766546,"playerCount":15584,"imageToken":"T_6461766546_8638","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Train with friends, battle difficult enemies, and complete challenging quests while working your way towards becoming the strongest! 

Changelog
- New code system
- New x2 XP/Yen/Strength boosts
- Added a confirmation for spinning when you have a legendary class
- Rebirths now increase spin luck 
- Added a buy all spins button
- Added another tyrone dummy npc to test critical damage
- Added 3 songs
- Scanner gamepass now abbreviates stats 

Controls
Z - Train
X - Lockon
N - Equip Sword (Ninja)
Q/E/R/F/C - Abilities
G - Awakening
CTRL - Sprint"},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4376790,"totalDownVotes":592571,"universeId":245662005,"name":"👮‍♀️ UPDATE! Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":19029,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"The latest Jailbreak update is here! 
🕵️‍♀️ THE AGENT! Limited vehicle that shoots rockets! Now off sale.
👮‍♀️ INTERROGATOR! Affordable Police SUV!
🔥 PIT MANEUVERS! Watch out criminals! 
⚽️ New Soccer Ball reward: Bonded Wheels!
🎉 5B Visits Garage Spoiler! TY for getting us here!! ❤️
Next update: An all new robbery!!


🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over five billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089"},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2167630,"totalDownVotes":665821,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":40740,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"¿Puedes ser el primero en llegar a la cima de este obby generado aleatoriamente sin ningún punto de control?

Si piensas que estas listo puedes probar la torre que contiene todas las 150 secciones aquí:
https://www.roblox.com/games/2127551566/THE-Tower-of-Hell

Los dueños de servidores VIP pueden usar los siguientes commandos
/setLength [3-150] para cambiar el tamaño de la torre seguido de
/skip para conseguir la próxima torre

Pedimos perdón por las personas que no pueden usar Shift-Lock debido a Roblox enlazando chat a Shift+7 en algunos teclados. Es un problema de Roblox que no podemos solucionar."},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":153995,"totalDownVotes":8325,"universeId":648454481,"name":"🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":9955,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure game. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint"},{"creatorId":5348890,"creatorName":"Thai Piece","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":239100,"totalDownVotes":21274,"universeId":1451439645,"name":"[ DRAGON 🐉 ] King Legacy","placeId":4520749081,"playerCount":21203,"imageToken":"T_4520749081_db05","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Join Dis for more code

- First Time you join game you have 0.1% to get free Conqueror Ability"},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":706638,"totalDownVotes":95191,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 💧 [WATER & BANNERS!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":16306,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"¡Bienvenidos a Islas!

🎵 Música por: https://twitter.com/LawnReality"},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":278810,"totalDownVotes":145660,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":18027,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1197343,"totalDownVotes":68190,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":13165,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":192669,"totalDownVotes":31551,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ BLEACH ] Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":7732,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Check the second page of the roster to see JoJo characters.
 
Controls:
Shift: Sprint
Q: Dodge
F: Block
Basic Attack: Mouse1
Space+Mouse1: Aerial Attack
Combine Basic Attacks and Aerial Attacks to discover new combos.
Use 1,2,3,4 for your character special moves.
Transformation: G

Developers:  Melon_Sensei, Chicken_Man, Snakeworl
Contributors: BIGPAPAMAUI, Sprano, K1LLUA, Nilvaat, jjjakey, Kogrin, rikaid, Estheking"},{"creatorId":3333298,"creatorName":"Rumble Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":914585,"totalDownVotes":119040,"universeId":892043755,"name":"[🍀SUPER LUCK🍀] Bubble Gum Simulator","placeId":2512643572,"playerCount":9008,"imageToken":"T_2512643572_64e","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Super Luck Event!

A game by Rumble Studios."},{"creatorId":1235888,"creatorName":"The MLG Gang","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":18635,"totalDownVotes":1314,"universeId":2492481398,"name":"Noob Army Tycoon","placeId":6610021055,"playerCount":20435,"imageToken":"T_6610021055_7d68","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Attack the other noobs in this epic tycoon."},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1804548,"totalDownVotes":141022,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":6277,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

[Update 5.5.1]
Map pool returned to normal non-holiday themed states
Added helmets for player models (no influence on bullet hitboxes)
